document.full_text: tuesday night was a coming of age of sorts for boston bruin's rookie center tyler seguin, who scored two goals and two assists as the boston tied its nhl eastern conference finals series with tampa bay.
document.title: bruins rookie seguin seizes his chance in style
lines_and_colors: tuesday night was a coming of age of sorts for boston bruin's rookie center tyler seguin, who scored two goals and two assists as the boston tied its nhl eastern conference finals series with tampa bay.
